Hey all

I was wondering if there is a way a disable or enable a bulk set of ribbon controls at runtime?
For example if the application is in a state whereby it cannot accept user interactivity (e.g a database not initialized or not connected yet) it would be nice to disable things in the ribbon to hint to the user.


Thanks!

I think the correct feature to use is Application Modes.

Check this post for more details. ﻿﻿﻿
I shall settle for that then. Thanks Arik :)
